name: MayDiang Handbags
description: Maydiang Group is a leading manufacturer of leather and non-leather accessories, specializing in handbags, wallets, and small leather goods. With over 30 years of experience, state-of-the-art facilities, and a commitment to quality and sustainability, Maydiang partners with top global brands.

features.title: Expert Craftsmanship
features.subtitle: Precision-made handbags and accessories using premium materials for superior quality.

features.title: Global Brand Partnerships
features.subtitle: Trusted by top international brands for reliable production and ethical standards.

features.title: Sustainable Manufacturing
features.subtitle: Eco-friendly materials and energy-efficient processes for a greener future.

specs.name: Material Variety
specs.spec: Leather, PU, nylon, canvas, wool, and more

specs.name: Factory Size
specs.spec: 400 acres with a 50,000 sqm production plant

specs.name: Compliance
specs.spec: SMETA & WRAP audited, REACH & PROP65 compliant

specs.name: MOQ Requirements
specs.spec: 100 pieces per SKU for bags, 300 pieces for small leather goods

specs.name: Equipment
specs.spec: Computerized cutting, needle detectors, automated production lines

shortdescription: Premium manufacturer of leather and non-leather accessories
